name: Ball Escape - Try Again
description:
Very fun to play, it really helps your brain get stronger.
There are some levels that are difficult, but that's just life!

Amazing gameplay
Mind-blowing game controls
Focusing game with smooth touches
Relaxing sounds that make your mind relax
Go escape space is a free game that you can enjoy the whole day and night

The ball game is controlled with one finger. The ball rolls over obstacles, and your task is to help overcome obstacles. Tap on the screen - the ball jumps. Very simple controls.
